death.attack.death: %s can not handle power of this item
enchantment.maenchants.curse_butterfinge: Chance to drop your item when mining or attacking a mob.
Deals damage to player when swimming in water.
enchantment.maenchants.curse_death.desc: Deals massive amount of damage when equipped or held in hand.
enchantment.maenchants.stone_mending.des: Chance to restore durability when mining stone.
enchantment.maenchants.momentum.desc: Mining speed increases for each consecutive block of the same one.
enchantment.maenchants.true_shot.desc: Arrows fired by this bow will not be affected by gravity.
enchantment.maenchants.floating.desc: Any mob struck with this enchant will be affected by the floating effect.
enchantment.maenchants.paralysis.desc: Any mob struck with this will find themselves unable to move, jump, or attack.
enchantment.maenchants.combo.desc: Increased damage with each successful strike, resets if it hits air or blocks.
enchantment.maenchants.lifesteal.desc: Part of dealt damage restore your health.
enchantment.maenchants.wisdom.desc: Gives you more XP when killing mobs
enchantment.maenchants.blazing_walker.de: Temporary turns lava into a melted cobblestone.
enchantment.maenchants.step_assist.desc: Allows you to walk onto 1 height block without jumping.
enchantment.maenchants.night_vision.desc: Gives you night vision potion effect when you wear it.
enchantment.maenchants.multi_jump.desc: Allows you to make more jump in air.
enchantment.maenchants.soft_fall.desc: Eliminates falling damage, downside is that it gives exhaustion.
enchantment.maenchants.timeless.desc: Item with this enchant with not despawn after time when dropped on ground.
